## Regular expressions master list created from public sources.
############################# WARNING!!!! ####################################
## Do not edit this file, use CustomRegexes.txt for your own regexes instead
## or else your changes will be lost.
##############################################################################
## To report false positives, or contribute: https://twitter.com/EKFiddle
## Last updated: 2018-02-23

URI	Bloodlust_Drive-by	\/bp\/(index\.php\?[\w-]+=[a-zA-Z0-9]+[_-]{1,2}|f\.php$|odt\.dat$)	https://twitter.com/jeromesegura/status/959127241941663744
URI	Chthonic_C2	pationare\.bit\/	http://www.malware-traffic-analysis.net/2016/12/27/index.html
URI	Disdain_EK	\/[a-zA-Z0-9]{24}\/[a-zA-Z0-9]{12}\.(php(\?ids=[a-zA-Z0-9]{8})?|swf)$	https://blog.malwarebytes.com/threat-analysis/2017/11/disdain-exploit-kit-served-side-social-engineering/
URI	Drive-by_Mining	coin-?hive|crypto-loot\.com|\/lib\/cryptonight-asmjs\.min\.js|\/lib\/worker\.wasm|minr\.pw	https://blog.malwarebytes.com/threat-analysis/2017/09/drive-by-mining-and-ads-the-wild-wild-west/
URI	Fobos_Campaign	\.(info|biz)\/\w{3,6}\/\?[a-z]{3}=[0-9]{10,12}$	https://www.malwarebytes.com/pdf/white-papers/CybercrimeTacticsAndTechniques-Q2-2017.pdf
URI	Formbook_Stealer	\/\?[a-zA-Z]{2,3}=[\w+/]{60,120}==&[a-z][A-Z]{2}[a-z]=[a-zA-Z0-9]{10,15}$	http://malware-traffic-analysis.net/2018/01/15/index.html
URI	GrandSoft_EK	\.xyz\/(fmovie\/play.swf|[0-9]\/[0-9]{4})$	https://twitter.com/kafeine/status/958298409944920064
URI	KaiXin	\/([A-Z][a-z]){3}\.jar$	http://malware-traffic-analysis.net/2017/11/17/index.html
URI	Magnigate	(-|_)0((-|_)[0-9]{5,7}){4,12}(-|_)$	https://blog.malwarebytes.com/cybercrime/2017/08/enemy-at-the-gates-reviewing-the-magnitude-exploit-kit-redirection-chain/
URI	Magnitude_EK	^http(s|):\/\/(?![a-z]+\.)([a-z0-9]+\.){2}(?!com)[a-z]{2,7}\/([0-9]{18,19}&[0-9]{7}|[a-z0-9]{32}(\.bmp)?)$	https://blog.malwarebytes.com/cybercrime/2017/08/enemy-at-the-gates-reviewing-the-magnitude-exploit-kit-redirection-chain/
URI	Money_LTD_URI	\.top\/(fff\/flap|logs\/fff|rrr\/[a-z0-9]{32})$
URI	Ngay_Campaign	\/([a-zA-Z0-9]{6}\?source=([0-9]{16}&external_id=\[CPA\]|[0-9]{8}&creative_id=)|gateway\.php\?frm=dm&token=eyJ|\?_subid=[0-9a-z]{16,20}&_token=uuid_[0-9a-z]{16,20}_)	http://www.nao-sec.org/2017/12/survey-of-ngay-campaign.html
URI	Ngay_CoinMiner_C2	ngay[0-9]{2,4}\.ru\/buon	http://www.nao-sec.org/2017/12/survey-of-ngay-campaign.html
URI	RIG_EK	(http(|s):\/\/|^)(?!www)([^.](([a-z0-9\-]{1,35}\.){2}[a-z\.]{2,15})|\b(?:\d{1,3}\.){3}\d{1,3}\b)\/\?[MNO]\w{6,7}(=|)&(\-|\w+(&|==?&?|\-)){10}	http://www.malware-traffic-analysis.net/2017/08/01/index.html
URI	Rulan_Campaign	\.ru\/[a-z]{3}$	https://www.malwarebytes.com/pdf/white-papers/CybercrimeTacticsAndTechniques-Q2-2017.pdf
URI	Seamless_Pre-gate	^https?:\/\/xn--[\w\.-]+\/redirect\.php$	https://traffic.moe/2018/01/25/index.html
URI	Seamless_Gate	^https?:\/\/(xn--[\w\.-]+|[a-z0-9]+\.info)\/pert\/gav[0-9]\.php$	https://umbrella.cisco.com/blog/2017/03/29/seamless-campaign-delivers-ramnit-via-rig-ek/
URI	Punycode(IDN)	^https?:\/\/xn--[\w\.-]+\/
URI	Terror_EK	(\/\w+\.gif\?\w+=[0-9]{10}|(\/([a-z]{3,15}\.){3}[a-z]{3,10}){2}\/[a-z]{4}\.[a-z]{3}|\/([a-z]{3,15}\.){3}[a-z]{3,10}\/[a-z]{4}-[a-z-]{5,7}\.[a-z]{3})$	http://malware-traffic-analysis.net/2017/10/17/index.html
URI	TSS_redirection_URI	\.tk\/index\/\?[0-9]{13}$
URI	TSS	\/((\?number=|AT-TollFree-)((1-)?8[0-9]{2}-[0-9]{3}-[0-9]{4}|([0-9]{2}-){4}[0-9]{2}&)|\?a=[0-9]{4}&source=[0-9]{5}_[0-9]{5})
SourceCode	Drive-by_Mining	\/lib\/(coinhive|miner).min.js	https://blog.malwarebytes.com/threat-analysis/2017/09/drive-by-mining-and-ads-the-wild-wild-west/
SourceCode	Fobos_Campaign	\.(info|biz)\/\w{3,6}\/\?[a-z]{3}=[0-9]{10,12}
SourceCode	EITest_FakeFont	<\/a><div id="upe0" onclick="eu0\(\)" >	https://www.proofpoint.com/us/threat-insight/post/EITest-Nabbing-Chrome-Users-Chrome-Font-Social-Engineering-Scheme
SourceCode	EITest_TSS	function checkTarget\(a\)\{if\(!getCookie\("popundr"\)\)
SourceCode	GrandSoft_EK	(document\.write\("<iframe src='"\+srcOfScript\+"'><\/iframe>"\);<\/script>|trifix = zerofix & zerofix & zerofix)	https://twitter.com/kafeine/status/958298409944920064
SourceCode	KaiXin	(\-1,){10}	http://malware-traffic-analysis.net/2017/11/17/index.html
SourceCode	Magniber_Ransom	<tr height="38"><td width="30%" style="font-size: 20px;font-family:sans-serif;text-align:left;">MY DECRYPTOR
SourceCode	GanCrab_Ransom	class="fa fa-key"><\/i> Buy GandCrab Decryptor<\/a><\/li>
SourceCode	Magnigate	this\[\([0-9]{2},[0-9]+(<|&&?|\-)[0-9]{2},[0-9]+\)\.t\\u006fS\\u0074	https://blog.malwarebytes.com/cybercrime/2017/08/enemy-at-the-gates-reviewing-the-magnitude-exploit-kit-redirection-chain/

SourceCode	Redirection_RIG_EK	(http(|s):\/\/|^)(?!www)([^.](([a-z0-9\-]{1,35}\.){2}[a-z\.]{2,15})|\b(?:\d{1,3}\.){3}\d{1,3}\b)\/\?[MN]\w{7}&(\w+(&|==?&?|\-)){10}
SourceCode	TSS_audio	(beep|alert|warning|Texts)[0-9]?\.mp3" type="audio
SourceCode	TSS_TFN	(\+1)?(-[0-9]{3}){2}-[0-9]{4}(\\n){30}
SourceCode	TSS_redirection	function createCookie13123213\(e,o,r\)
